message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CR, cs.SY, cs.RO 

This paper is about devising optimal attacks on reinforcement learning policies, which falls under the category of machine learning and artificial intelligence. Specifically, the paper discusses the vulnerability of deep reinforcement learning policies to adversarial attacks and proposes methods for designing optimal attacks. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also deals with security and control, which could place it in cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) and cs.SY (Systems and Control), respectively. Finally, the paper uses Markov Decision Processes and Reinforcement Learning techniques, which could also place it in cs.RO (Robotics).
